Ingredients.5: 0.25 cup chocolate chips, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.6: 0.25 cup chopped walnuts, or to taste (Optional)

Ingredients.8: 2 teaspoons cinnamon sugar, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a baking sheet.

Directions.2: Stir matzo cake meal, sugar, potato starch, eggs, chocolate chips, walnuts, and lemon juice together to make a dough.

Directions.3: Divide the dough into thirds. Shape each piece of dough into a log and place on the prepared baking sheet.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until browned, about 30 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove logs from oven and cut into slices.

Directions.6: Arrange the slices on the baking sheet; sprinkle with cinnamon sugar.

Directions.7: Return to oven and bake until the mandelbread are browned and crisp, about 10 more minutes. Turn the mandelbread after 5 minutes to crisp both sides.
